ch0285_00_kai/0101_0701_02_10:
I can’t wait to see what awaits me in this space
called Pasio!
ch0285_00_kai/7101_0701_01_10:
I think sync pairs are the ideal way for people and
Pokémon to coexist.
ch0285_00_kai/7101_0701_02_10:
But a lot of people in Hisui are scared of
Pokémon, so building that sort of relationship
there would be difficult...
ch0285_00_kai/7101_0701_03_10:
That’s why I’ll become a wonderful sync pair with
my partner first!
ch0285_00_kai/7102_0701_01_10:
I can’t believe someone created an island
this big...
ch0285_00_kai/7102_0701_02_10:
If they have the power to create a new space...
That power is just like Palkia’s!
ch0285_00_kai/7103_0701_01_10:
I’ve heard there’s a place called Alola
and they have Island Kahunas!
ch0285_00_kai/7103_0701_02_10:
I’d like to see with my own eyes what kind of
Pokémon they are! Do you feel the same?
ch0285_00_kai/7104_0701_01_10: Pasio is full of people from all kinds of places.
ch0285_00_kai/7104_0701_02_10: But I believe we all share a love of Pokémon.
ch0285_00_kai/7105_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], if you ever have a
time when things aren’t going your way and you
feel small...
ch0285_00_kai/7105_0701_02_10:
find something you can accomplish, even if
it’s simple, and broaden your world one step
at a time!
ch0285_00_kai/7105_0701_03_10: And make sure not to rush!
ch0285_00_kai/1701_0701_01_10:
Here, take this as a thank-you for what you do
every day!
ch0285_00_kai/1701_0702_01_10:
If I find something interesting again, I’ll give it
to you!
ch0285_00_kai/2501_0701_01_10:
I do love the flute. I feel as if its tones carry to
the very ends of space.
ch0285_00_kai/2501_0701_02_10: When I play it, Hisui’s scenery floats into my mind.
ch0285_00_kai/2501_0701_03_10:
I’d love for you to see the magnificent land of
Hisui! You’ll definitely like it!
ch0285_00_kai/2501_0702_01_10:
I hope I’ll come to like Pasio as much as I
like Hisui.
ch0285_00_kai/2501_0702_02_10:
Show me all of Pasio’s sights!
Promise me!
ch0285_00_kai/2511_0701_01_10:
I’d like to walk every corner of this spacious
island, but...
ch0285_00_kai/2511_0701_02_10:
I’d rather not go near the volcano. I don’t like
the heat...
ch0285_00_kai/2511_0701_03_10:
I don’t mind glaciers, though! I’ll even go into
the ocean!
ch0285_00_kai/2511_0702_01_10:
This era has what you call
Pokémon Gyms, correct?
ch0285_00_kai/2511_0702_02_10:
I want to be the one who uses Ice-type Pokémon
to test challengers!
ch0285_00_kai/3001_0701_01_10:
Everyone looks so busy in the morning. I personally
don’t like the feeling of working against
the clock...
ch0285_00_kai/3003_0701_01_10:
Phew... Oh, hello there. Now that the sun’s out,
it’s getting quite hot...
ch0285_00_kai/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening! It’s cool and comfortable at night,
so I’m on my way out to explore this island!
